main event: An unidentified flying object was visually observed over Ladd AFB, Alaska on December 6, 1952. The object was described as a white oval shaped light that changed color and traveled at high speeds.
interesting points: The object was reportedly moving at speeds between 3 to 600 miles per hour., The light changed color from white to red and back repeatedly., The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes., No conventional aircraft were reported in the area at the time of the sighting., The weather conditions were night and clear, with visibility unaffected by wind.
sighted object: a white oval shaped light that changed to red
witness description: The witnesses included pilot and radar observer from the F-94A aircraft, both of whom were trained military personnel.
